mapper.insert: insert into community(num, fname, oname, tag, title, c_day, c_time, location, price, detail, people, contents, writer, id) values(community_seq.nextval,#{fname}, #{oname}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{c_day}, #{c_time}, #{location}, #{price}, #{detail}, #{people}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{id})
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum R, S.* from (select * from community order by num desc) S) where R between 1 and 9
